topic.title: What's new in Release 18.2
topic.p: For Mingle onsite customers, please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 18.2.

note.p: All of the features below are already available for our Mingle in the cloud customers.

section.title: Exports
section.p: Mingle is being retired in July 2019. The Export feature allows export of all the data that has ever been put in Mingle.

All cards, pages, murmurs and much more from all projects are easily available as spreadsheets.You may additionally choose to export all history - a collection of every action that has been taken in your project.
Mingle Plus customers can also choose to export their programs and dependencies. This feature is available to Mingle administrators only, and can be found in Export tab in the main header
Read more about the Export feature: Mingle End of Life and migration

bullets.item: In Mingle Plus, an issue on Firefox with the progress bar seen when saving Objectives is fixed.
On a fresh installation of Mingle Plus, the error seen when clicking on the program wall is fixed.
The issue with SSL in Mingle 18.1 was fixed.
